IVAT’s Short Courses
====================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Sep 14, 2016 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![short-course-2a](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Short-Course-2a.jpg)

The Institute of High Voltage and High Current (IVAT), Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), will organise two short courses as follows:

*   3-DAY SHORT COURSE ON PARTIAL DISCHARGE & IMPULSE TESTING MODULE, 21-23 November 2016 ([click here for the brochure](http://ivat.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2016/09/Broucher-3-day-Short-Course-on-PD-and-Impulse.pdf)
    )
*   3-DAY SHORT COURSE ON HIGH VOLTAGE TESTING TECHNIQUE, 19-21 December 2016 ([click here for the brochure](http://ivat.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2016/09/Broucher-3-day-Short-Course-on-High-Voltage-Testing-Technique2.pdf)
    )

Fee: RM4800 per person per course  
Venue: Johor Bahru  
The dates of the courses are dependent upon demands. Group discounts are available. Please contact IVAT for further details.
